data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When the detectives showed up at the scene, all they found was a pair of stockings. From ____, ____ concluded ____ the ____ had ____ at ____ scene. But ____ was ____ to ____ how ____ she ____ remained ____, ____ what ____ occurred. Perhaps she had been moved from this location and taken to another, or perhaps the crime had been committed right there.
data.partBlankContent: When the detectives showed up at the scene, all they found was a pair of stockings. From th__, th__ concluded th__ the vic___ had be__ at t__ scene. But i_ was impos_____ to te__ how lo__ she h__ remained th___, o_ what h__ occurred. data.fullContent: When the detectives showed up at the scene, all they found was a pair of stockings. From that, they concluded that the victim had been at the scene. But it was impossible to tell how long she had remained there, or what had occurred. Perhaps she had been moved from this location and taken to another, or perhaps the crime had been committed right there.
data.answer: 当侦探们出现在现场时，他们发现的只是一双长统袜。根据这一点，他们断定受害者当时就在现场。但是谁也不知道她在那儿呆了多久，也不知道发生了什么事。也许她被从这个地方转移到另一个地方，或者犯罪就发生在那里。
